data.comment: Goal! Conor Chaplin gives Barnsley a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 45, Nathan Byrne (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Leigh Doughty has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Matt Clarke with Kamil Jozwiak. This is the first substitution made today by Phillip Cocu.
Kamil Jozwiak (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
Louie Sibley is replacing Graeme Shinnie for Derby County at Pride Park Stadium.
In the minute 59, Mads Andersen (Barnsley) has received a yellow card from Leigh Doughty.
Herbie Kane is replacing Matty James for the away team.
Michael Sollbauer is booked for the away team.
In the minute 78, Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a second substitution, with Victor Adeboyejo replacing Dominik Frieser.
Phillip Cocu is making the team's third substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Kazim replacing Tom Lawrence.
Great finish from Victor Adeboyejo to give Barnsley a 0-2 lead.
In the minute 89, The away team replace Cauley Woodrow with Aapo Halme.
The match has come to a close in Derby. The final score is 0-2.
Louie Sibley (Derby County) gets a yellow card.
